events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin review shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for a software development role.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering has been assigned to handle your application going forward.
Your profile has passed the initial screening for the engineer role and we would like to proceed to the next stage.
Thank you for confirming your interest and availability for progressing to the technical interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC with the engineering team.
